#summary Utility class used to turn any object into a singleton.

= Introduction =
The SingletonFactory can be used to turn any object in your application into a singleton. A singleton is a pattern that restricts the instantiation of an object to one instance.  Using this factory only one object will be created per Class Type.  However, outside of the factory, there is no restriction or control.  Below we will detail the working of the class.
